mapper.select: SELECT data_id,temperature,humidity,formaldehyde,ddate,user_id FROM datadetail WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ddate desc LIMIT 0,5

SELECT HOUR(ddate) AS hour, AVG(formaldehyde) AS avg FROM datadetail WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND ddate BETWEEN concat('${averageDayDate}'," 00:00:00") AND concat('${averageDayDate}'," 23:59:59") GROUP BY HOUR(ddate)

SELECT DAY(ddate) AS day, AVG(formaldehyde) AS avg FROM datadetail WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND ddate BETWEEN concat('${beginDate}'," 00:00:00") AND concat('${endDate}'," 23:59:59") GROUP BY DAY(ddate);
